org.apps8os.trafficsense.android

Class TimeOnlyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • org.apps8os.trafficsense.android.TimeOnlyService

  • public class TimeOnlyService
extends Service
    Service that follows a journey based on time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  TimeOnlyService.NextWaypointReceiver
      Broadcast receiver that receives intents indicating that next stop has been reached.
      private class  TimeOnlyService.VibrateAndMakeNotificationReceiver
      Handler for get off events.

      • mAM

        private AlarmManager mAM
        The clock/alarm event generator.

      • mNextWaypointIntent

        private PendingIntent mNextWaypointIntent
        PendingIntent for next stop events. Use a common instance so we can cancel the pending one (if any) before we stop the service.

      • mGetOffIntent

        private PendingIntent mGetOffIntent
        PendingIntent for get off notifications.
        See Also:
        mNextWaypointIntent

      • errorOnStart

        private boolean errorOnStart
        Did we encounter an error during onStartCommand(). If true, the service failed to start. onStartCommand() should stopSelf() and onDestroy() should not do the clean up. This would be true if the service is automatically restarted by Android.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimeOnlyService

        public TimeOnlyService()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        Create common resources for the service.

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                 int flags,
                 int startId)
        Start rolling the service. The service is stopped when: 1) the journey ends 2) Android kills it 3) errorOnStart is true

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Clean up. Note that invocation is not guaranteed.

      • scheduleNextAlarm

        private void scheduleNextAlarm(long atMillis)
        Schedule a next stop alarm.
        Parameters:
        atMillis - time in milliseconds that the alarm should go off.

      • scheduleGetOffAlarm

        private void scheduleGetOffAlarm(long atMillis)
        Schedule a get off alarm.
        Parameters:
        atMillis - time in milliseconds that the alarm should go off.

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)
        No bind to this service.
